alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:52PM EST until December 19 at 12:20AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Esopus Creek at Cold Brook. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. Water begins to overflow banks above Ashokan Reservoir with little damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.4 feet and receding. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 5.7 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 pm: 11.4 Forecast: Mon 7 pm 10.3 Tue 1 am 8.4 Tue 7 am 7.7 Tue 1 pm 7.2 Tue 7 pm 6.8 Wed 1 am 6.5 Wed 7 am 6.2 Wed 1 pm 6.1 Wed 7 pm 5.9 Thu 1 am 5.8 Thu 7 am 5.7 Thu 1 pm 5.7 &&
